nodes.text: Claustrophobia was an abnormal fear of having no escape or being stuck in cramped places. During the Clone Wars, it was reported that some of the Galactic Republic's clone trooper displayed symptoms of claustrophobia, a trait inherited from their genetic template, Jango Fett. Other known claustrophobes included the Jedi Knight Kira Carsen, and, to some extent, the plant development specialist Plee.
